Estimated budget expenses for six months in Delft

Airfare = $750/ticket (one-way) (_*trips longer than 10 hrs can be business class*_)
Housing = ~$550/month (1 bedroom near TU Delft)
Meals and incidental expenses (M&IE) = $68/day (Tier IV)
Transportation = $5/day for bus tickets
Communication = $10 every other night after first 24 hrs, unless university cellphone is issued.
